summary: A simple retexture made on request
descriptionHtml:
This mod was made on request by DemoNick (thread to be found here: http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1415715-req-black-or-grey-retex-of-the-ragged-robe-and-cap/page__fromsearch__1)

The mod adds a dark, almost black retexture of the Prisoner clothes, Beggar clothes, Beggar Hat and Beggar boots. The items are fully enchantable and can be used with any race or gender in game. 

The new items are located in a chest in Helgen Keep cave near the place where you confront a bear as you leave Helgen. Items are obtainable even after the tutorial is finished
author: Aknevrec
